newsitem.title: UK: All Nippon ups ex-UK cargo rates 3.25 pct.
newsitem.headline: All Nippon ups ex-UK cargo rates 3.25 pct.

text.p: All Nippon Airways has increased its ex-UK cargo rates by the equivalent of about 3.25 percent with effect from January 1, its assistant UK cargo manager John O'Shea told Reuters.
He said that the increase was introduced in order to cover escalating fuel prices but was not a surcharge.
Any such surcharges, which have been implemented by other carriers, would need regulatory approval by the Japan Civil Aviation Authority to come into effect in the Japan market.
"As this has not been forthcoming, we have gone with the rate rise, which is our way of implementing what other airlines have done in the form of fuel surchargesm," he added.
All Nippon has also increased its ex-Paris cargo rates from January 1 by about three per cent per kg, the carrier said. -- Air Cargo Newsroom Tel+44 171 542 7706 Fax+44 171 542 5017
